PyAnnotation Module - PyRegion.py¶

class PyRegion.PyRegion(id, anchors=None)[source]¶

The area in the text file being annotated. A region is defined by a sequence of C{PyAnchor} objects.

__init__(id, anchors=None)[source]¶

Constructor for C{PyRegion}.

Parameters:
  • id – C{str}
  • anchors – C{list} of C{PyAnchor}
set_anchor(index, anchor)[source]¶

Sets the anchors at the given index.

set_anchors(anchors)[source]¶

Sets the list of anchors that bounds the region.
